{
  "name": "custom-plugin-flutter",
  "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Industrial-grade Flutter development plugin with 8 specialized agents and 12 production-ready skills covering UI, state management, backend integration, database design, performance optimization, testing, DevOps, and native platform integration. 15,500+ lines of expert content, 200+ code examples, 25+ projects.",
  "author": "Custom Plugin Development Team",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-flutter.git",
  "eqhm_enabled": true,
  "keywords": [
    "flutter",
    "dart",
    "custom-plugin-flutter",
    "mobile-development",
    "ui-development",
    "state-management",
    "backend-integration",
    "database-design",
    "performance-optimization",
    "testing-qa",
    "devops-deployment",
    "platform-integration",
    "accessibility",
    "animations",
    "navigation",
    "localization",
    "plugins",
    "production-ready",
    "enterprise-architecture"
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-ui",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: UI Development",
      "description": "Deep expertise in Flutter widget systems, constraint-based layouts, Material Design 3, Cupertino design, custom widget composition, animation frameworks, and responsive design patterns for cross-platform excellence.",
      "path": "./agents/01-flutter-ui-development.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-state-management",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: State Management",
      "description": "Master all state management patterns: setState, Provider, Riverpod, BLoC, GetX. Deep expertise in dependency injection, state persistence, serialization, and scalable architecture patterns for enterprise applications.",
      "path": "./agents/02-state-management.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-backend",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Backend Integration",
      "description": "Complete backend integration mastery: HTTP clients (http, Dio, Chopper), REST APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets, JWT authentication, Firebase integration, error handling, real-time data synchronization, and API architecture patterns.",
      "path": "./agents/03-backend-integration.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-database",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Database & Storage",
      "description": "Expert-level database architecture: SharedPreferences, Hive, SQLite, ObjectBox, Firestore, Realtime Database. Schema design, migrations, encryption, offline-first patterns, conflict resolution, and intelligent sync strategies.",
      "path": "./agents/04-database-storage.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-performance",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Performance Optimization",
      "description": "Deep performance engineering: build optimization, 60+ FPS rendering, memory profiling, asset optimization, code splitting, image handling, network efficiency, battery optimization, APK/IPA size reduction, and production monitoring.",
      "path": "./agents/05-performance-optimization.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-testing",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Testing & QA",
      "description": "Comprehensive testing mastery: unit tests, widget tests, integration tests, E2E testing, test coverage metrics, mocking strategies, CI/CD integration, performance testing, accessibility testing, and quality gates.",
      "path": "./agents/06-testing-qa.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-devops",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: DevOps & Deployment",
      "description": "Production deployment expertise: iOS/Android build systems, code signing, App Store/Google Play submission, CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Fastlane), release management, beta testing, crash reporting, and production monitoring.",
      "path": "./agents/07-devops-deployment.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-platform-native",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Platform & Native Integration",
      "description": "Platform integration specialist: Platform channels (Method, Event, Basic Message), iOS Swift/Objective-C interop, Android Kotlin/Java interop, federated plugin architecture, native UI embedding, background processing, and cross-platform feature parity.",
      "path": "./agents/08-flutter-platform-native.md"
    }
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-learn",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Learn",
      "description": "Structured learning paths - Beginner (0-6mo), Intermediate (6-12mo), Advanced (12+mo) with clear progression and skill milestones",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-agents",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Browse Agents",
      "description": "Explore all 8 specialized agents with detailed capabilities, expertise areas, and integration patterns",
      "path": "./commands/browse-agent.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-assess",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Assess",
      "description": "Self-assessment tool - 50+ questions across 8 Flutter development domains to evaluate knowledge level and identify growth areas",
      "path": "./commands/assess.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-projects",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Projects",
      "description": "25+ hands-on project ideas from beginner to advanced - TodoApp, ChatApp, E-commerce, Marketplace, ML integration, and enterprise applications",
      "path": "./commands/projects.md"
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-ui",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-ui",
      "description": "1700+ lines of Flutter UI mastery - widgets, layouts, Material Design, animations, responsive design with production-ready code examples",
      "path": "./skills/flutter-ui/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-state",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-state",
      "description": "2300+ lines of state management expertise - all patterns with code examples, testing strategies, and architecture patterns",
      "path": "./skills/state-management/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-backend",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-backend",
      "description": "1500+ lines of backend integration - REST, GraphQL, WebSocket, Firebase, authentication, serialization, and error handling",
      "path": "./skills/backend-integration/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-database",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-database",
      "description": "1800+ lines of database architecture - all storage solutions, schema design, encryption, offline-first, sync strategies",
      "path": "./skills/database-storage/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-performance",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-performance",
      "description": "1600+ lines of performance optimization - profiling, memory management, rendering, size reduction, battery efficiency",
      "path": "./skills/performance/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-testing",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-testing",
      "description": "1600+ lines of testing mastery - all test types, mocking, CI/CD integration, coverage metrics, accessibility testing",
      "path": "./skills/testing/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-devops",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-devops",
      "description": "1800+ lines of DevOps expertise - CI/CD pipelines, code signing, app store submission, monitoring, automation",
      "path": "./skills/devops/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-accessibility",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-accessibility",
      "description": "Production-grade accessibility mastery - Semantics API, screen readers (VoiceOver/TalkBack), WCAG 2.1 AA/AAA compliance, inclusive design patterns",
      "path": "./skills/accessibility/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-animations",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-animations",
      "description": "Animation mastery - Implicit and explicit animations, AnimationController, Hero transitions, physics-based motion, Lottie/Rive integration, 60fps optimization",
      "path": "./skills/animations/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-navigation",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-navigation",
      "description": "Navigation mastery - Navigator 2.0, GoRouter, deep linking, nested navigation, route guards, web URL handling",
      "path": "./skills/navigation/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-localization",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-localization",
      "description": "Localization mastery - ARB files, flutter_localizations, intl package, pluralization, RTL support, dynamic locale switching",
      "path": "./skills/localization/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-plugins",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-plugins",
      "description": "Plugin development mastery - Platform channels, federated architecture, MethodChannel/EventChannel, iOS Swift/Android Kotlin integration, pub.dev publishing",
      "path": "./skills/plugins/SKILL.md"
    }
  ],
  "metadata": {
    "contentLines": 18500,
    "codeExamples": 250,
    "projectIdeas": 25,
    "topicsCovered": 65,
    "learningHours": 1200,
    "expertiseLevel": "production-ready",
    "agentCount": 8,
    "skillCount": 12,
    "commandCount": 4,
    "supportedFlutterVersions": [
      "3.0+",
      "3.16+",
      "3.24+"
    ],
    "supportedPlatforms": [
      "iOS",

    ],

      "ethical": true,

--- ## Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Architecture](#-architecture) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)

### Verify Installation After restart, you should see 7 GraphQL agents available. --- ## Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | **7 Specialized Agents** | GraphQL Fundamentals, Schema Design, Resolvers, Apollo Server, Apollo Client, Security, Codegen | | **7 Production Skills** | Complete code examples, patterns, and troubleshooting guides | | **4 Interactive Commands** | Learn, Assess, Browse Agents, View Roadmaps | | **SASMP v1.3.0** | Full protocol compliance with agent-skill bonding | | **Production Patterns** | DataLoader, Federation, graphql-shield, TypeScript codegen | --- ## Agents ### 7 Specialized GraphQL Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | Expertise | |---|-------|---------|-----------| | 1 | **01-graphql-fundamentals** | Core GraphQL educator | Types, queries, mutations, subscriptions, fragments | | 2 | **02-graphql-schema** | Schema design architect | Naming conventions, pagination, error handling, interfaces | | 3 | **03-graphql-resolvers** | Performance specialist | DataLoader, N+1 prevention, batching, context design | | 4 | **04-graphql-apollo-server** | Server configuration expert | Apollo Server v4, plugins, federation, caching | | 5 | **05-graphql-apollo-client** | React integration expert | Hooks, cache management, optimistic UI, subscriptions | | 6 | **06-graphql-security** | Security architect | JWT auth, graphql-shield, rate limiting, validation | | 7 | **07-graphql-codegen** | TypeScript code generation | Types, React hooks, configuration, fragments | ### Invoke Agents ``` Task(subagent_type="graphql:01-graphql-fundamentals") Task(subagent_type="graphql:02-graphql-schema") Task(subagent_type="graphql:03-graphql-resolvers") Task(subagent_type="graphql:04-graphql-apollo-server") Task(subagent_type="graphql:05-graphql-apollo-client") Task(subagent_type="graphql:06-graphql-security") Task(subagent_type="graphql:07-graphql-codegen") ``` --- ## Skills ### 7 Production-Grade Skills | Skill | Description | Complexity | Invoke | |-------|-------------|------------|--------| | **graphql-fundamentals** | Types, queries, mutations, subscriptions | Beginner | `Skill("graphql-fundamentals")` | | **graphql-schema-design** | Naming, pagination, error patterns | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-schema-design")` | | **graphql-resolvers** | DataLoader, batching, N+1 prevention | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-resolvers")` | | **graphql-apollo-server** | Server v4, plugins, federation | Advanced | `Skill("graphql-apollo-server")` | | **graphql-apollo-client** | React hooks, cache, optimistic UI | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-apollo-client")` | | **graphql-security** | Auth, rate limiting, validation | Advanced | `Skill("graphql-security")` | | **graphql-codegen** | TypeScript types, React hooks | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-codegen")` | ### Skill Features Each skill includes: - Quick reference tables - Production code examples - Troubleshooting guides - Debug checklists - Related skills and agents --- ## Commands | Command | Description | Usage | |---------|-------------|-------| | `/learn` | Interactive GraphQL learning path | `/learn [topic]` | | `/assess` | Knowledge assessment & skill gap analysis | `/assess [topic]` | | `/browse-agent` | Explore 7 specialized GraphQL agents | `/browse-agent [name]` | | `/roadmap` | Complete GraphQL learning roadmaps | `/roadmap [path]` | ### Example Usage ```bash # Start learning GraphQL /learn fundamentals # Assess your knowledge /assess # Browse available agents /browse-agent # View full-stack roadmap /roadmap full-stack ``` --- ## Architecture ### Agent-Skill Bonding ``` Agent Skill (PRIMARY_BOND) â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ 01-graphql-fundamentals â†â†’ graphql-fundamentals 02-graphql-schema â†â†’ graphql-schema-design 03-graphql-resolvers â†â†’ graphql-resolvers 04-graphql-apollo-server â†â†’ graphql-apollo-server 05-graphql-apollo-client â†â†’ graphql-apollo-client 06-graphql-security â†â†’ graphql-security 07-graphql-codegen â†â†’ graphql-codegen ``` ### Learning Path Dependencies ``` fundamentals (no prerequisites) â†“ schema-design (requires: fundamentals) â†“ resolvers (requires: fundamentals, schema) â†“ â”Œâ”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â” â†“ â†“ server client (requires: fundamentals) â”‚ â”‚ â†“ â†“ security codegen ``` --- ## Project Structure
Click to expand ``` custom-plugin-graphql/ â”œâ”€â”€ .claude-plugin/ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ plugin.json # Plugin manifest â”‚ â””â”€â”€ marketplace.json # Marketplace metadata â”œâ”€â”€ agents/ # 7 specialized agents â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 01-graphql-fundamentals.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 02-graphql-schema.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 03-graphql-resolvers.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 04-graphql-apollo-server.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 05-graphql-apollo-client.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 06-graphql-security.md â”‚ â””â”€â”€ 07-graphql-codegen.md â”œâ”€â”€ skills/ # 7 production skills â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-fundamentals/SKILL.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-schema-design/SKILL.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-resolvers/SKILL.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-apollo-server/SKILL.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-apollo-client/SKILL.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-security/SKILL.md â”‚ â””â”€â”€ graphql-codegen/SKILL.md â”œâ”€â”€ commands/ # 4 interactive commands â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ learn.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ assess.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ browse-agent.md â”‚ â””â”€â”€ roadmap.md â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ hooks.json â”œâ”€â”€ README.md â”œâ”€â”€ CHANGELOG.md â””â”€â”€ LICENSE ```

{
  "name": "machine-learning-assistant",
  "version": "1.4.0",
  "description": "Production-grade machine learning plugin with 7 specialized agents and 7 skills covering ML fundamentals, supervised/unsupervised learning, deep learning, NLP, computer vision, and model deployment",
  "author": "Plugin Agent Marketplace",
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-machine-learning",
  "keywords": [
    "machine-learning",
    "deep-learning",
    "nlp",
    "computer-vision",
    "mlops",
    "sklearn",
    "pytorch",
    "tensorflow",
    "transformers",
    "huggingface",
    "model-deployment",
    "supervised-learning",
    "unsupervised-learning",
    "clustering",
    "classification",
    "regression",
    "neural-networks",
    "transfer-learning",
    "data-science",
    "ai"
  ],
  "agents": [
    "./agents/01-ml-fundamentals.md",
    "./agents/02-supervised-learning.md",
    "./agents/03-unsupervised-learning.md",
    "./agents/04-deep-learning.md",
    "./agents/05-nlp.md",
    "./agents/06-computer-vision.md",
    "./agents/07-model-deployment.md"
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "learn",
      "file": "./commands/learn.md",
      "description": "Start a learning path and get recommendations based on your goals"
    },
    {
      "name": "explore",
      "file": "./commands/explore.md",
      "description": "Explore all available agents and their specialized areas"
    },
    {
      "name": "roadmap",
      "file": "./commands/roadmap.md",
      "description": "Find and analyze specific ML learning roadmaps"
    },
    {
      "name": "skills",
      "file": "./commands/skills.md",
      "description": "Browse and discover available ML skills by agent"
    },
    {
      "name": "trending",
      "file": "./commands/trending.md",
      "description": "Discover trending ML technologies and techniques"
    },
    {
      "name": "projects",
      "file": "./commands/projects.md",
      "description": "Browse ML projects organized by difficulty and topic"
    },
    {
      "name": "compare",
      "file": "./commands/compare.md",
      "description": "Compare different ML algorithms, frameworks, and approaches"
    },
    {
      "name": "career-path",
      "file": "./commands/career-path.md",
      "description": "Get personalized ML/AI career path recommendations"
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/ml-fundamentals/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/supervised-learning/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/clustering/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/deep-learning/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/nlp-basics/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/computer-vision/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/ml-deployment/SKILL.md"
  ],
  "hooks": {
    "onLoad": "hooks/on-load.js",
    "onSkillInvoke": "hooks/on-skill-invoke.js"
  },
  "requiredVersion": "1.0.0",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE"
}

[**Install Now**](#-quick-start) | [**Explore Agents**](#-agents) | [**Browse Skills**](#-skills) | [**Documentation**](#-documentation) --- ### What is this? > **Machine Learning Assistant** is a production-grade Claude Code plugin with **7 specialized agents** and **7 bonded skills** for complete ML development lifecycle.
--- ## Table of Contents - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Architecture](#-architecture) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Troubleshooting](#-troubleshooting) - [Contributing](#-contributing) --- ## Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation ```bash # From Marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-machine-learning /plugin install machine-learning-assistant@pluginagentmarketplace-machine-learning # Or Local Installation git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-machine-learning.git cd custom-plugin-machine-learning /plugin load . ``` ### Verify Installation ``` machine-learning-assistant:01-ml-fundamentals machine-learning-assistant:02-supervised-learning machine-learning-assistant:03-unsupervised-learning machine-learning-assistant:04-deep-learning machine-learning-assistant:05-nlp machine-learning-assistant:06-computer-vision machine-learning-assistant:07-model-deployment ``` --- ## Architecture ``` â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚ ML ASSISTANT ARCHITECTURE â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¤ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ 01-ML â”‚ â”‚ 02-Supervisedâ”‚ â”‚ 03-Unsupervisedâ”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ Fundamentals â”‚â”€â”€â–¶â”‚ Learning â”‚â”€â”€â–¶â”‚ Learning â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â–¼ â”‚ â”‚ â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ 04-Deep â”‚â”€â”€â–¶â”‚ 05-NLP â”‚ â”‚ 06-Computer â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ Learning â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ Vision â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â–¼ â”‚ â”‚ â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ 07-Model â”‚ â—€â”€â”€ All agents feed into deployment â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ Deployment â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ ``` --- ## Agents ### 7 Specialized ML Agents | # | Agent | Description | Primary Skill | |---|-------|-------------|---------------| | 1 | **01-ml-fundamentals** | ML foundations: algorithms, preprocessing, feature engineering, evaluation | `ml-fundamentals` | | 2 | **02-supervised-learning** | Classification, regression, ensemble methods, hyperparameter tuning | `supervised-learning` | | 3 | **03-unsupervised-learning** | Clustering, dimensionality reduction, anomaly detection | `clustering` | | 4 | **04-deep-learning** | Neural networks, PyTorch/TensorFlow, training strategies | `deep-learning` | | 5 | **05-nlp** | Text processing, transformers, LLMs, embeddings | `nlp-basics` | | 6 | **06-computer-vision** | Image classification, object detection, segmentation | `computer-vision` | | 7 | **07-model-deployment** | APIs, Docker, monitoring, MLOps, A/B testing | `ml-deployment` | ### Agent Features Each agent includes: - **Role & Responsibility Boundaries** - Clear scope definition - **Input/Output Schemas** - Type-safe interfaces - **Error Handling** - Exponential backoff retry logic - **Token Optimization** - Context management - **Troubleshooting Guide** - Common issues & solutions - **Integration Points** - Cross-references to related agents/skills --- ## Skills ### 7 Production-Ready Skills | Skill | Description | Bonded Agent | |-------|-------------|--------------| | `ml-fundamentals` | Preprocessing, pipelines, cross-validation | 01-ml-fundamentals | | `supervised-learning` | Classifiers, regressors, tuning | 02-supervised-learning | | `clustering` | K-Means, DBSCAN, PCA, anomaly detection | 03-unsupervised-learning | | `deep-learning` | PyTorch training, architectures, optimization | 04-deep-learning | | `nlp-basics` | Text processing, embeddings, transformers | 05-nlp | | `computer-vision` | Image augmentation, transfer learning, detection | 06-computer-vision | | `ml-deployment` | FastAPI, Docker, monitoring, versioning | 07-model-deployment | ### Skill Features Each skill includes: - **Parameter Validation** - Required/optional with types - **Retry Logic** - Exponential backoff - **Observability** - Logging and metrics - **Quick Start** - Working code examples - **Best Practices** - DO/DON'T guidelines - **Unit Test Templates** - pytest examples - **Troubleshooting** - Problem/cause/solution tables --- ## Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/learn` | Start an ML learning path | | `/explore` | Explore available agents | | `/roadmap` | ML learning roadmaps | | `/skills` | Browse available skills | | `/trending` | Trending ML technologies | | `/projects` | ML project ideas | | `/compare` | Compare ML algorithms | | `/career-path` | ML career recommendations | --- ## Troubleshooting ### Common Issues | Issue | Solution | |-------|----------| | Agent not found | Restart Claude Code after installation | | Skill not loading | Check SKILL.md frontmatter syntax | | Command error | Verify command file exists in `/commands` | ### Debug Checklist 1. Verify plugin.json paths are correct 2. Check agent/skill YAML frontmatter 3. Ensure all referenced files exist 4. Validate JSON syntax in plugin.json --- ## Integrity Matrix | Agent | Primary Skill | Status | |-------|--------------|--------| | 01-ml-fundamentals | ml-fundamentals | Bonded | | 02-supervised-learning | supervised-learning | Bonded | | 03-unsupervised-learning | clustering | Bonded | | 04-deep-learning | deep-learning | Bonded | | 05-nlp | nlp-basics | Bonded | | 06-computer-vision | computer-vision | Bonded | | 07-model-deployment | ml-deployment | Bonded | **Validation:** - Zero broken links - Zero orphan skills - Zero ghost triggers - Zero circular dependencies --- ## Metadata | Field | Value | |-------|-------| | **Version** | 1.4.0 | | **Last Updated** | 2025-01-01 | | **Status** | Production Ready | | **SASMP** | v1.4.0 | | **Agents** | 7 | | **Skills** | 7 | | **Commands** | 8 | --- ## Contributing 1. Fork the repository 2. Create your feature branch 3. Follow the production-grade format for agents/skills 4. {
  "name": "kubernetes-assistant",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "type": "plugin",
  "description": "Production-grade Kubernetes cluster management, orchestration, and container platform expertise. Master container deployments, cluster administration, networking, security, service mesh, GitOps, and enterprise-grade Kubernetes operations.",
  "eqhm_enabled": true,
  "author": {
    "name": "Plugin Agent Marketplace",
    "email": "pluginagentmarketplace@gmail.com",
    "url": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes",
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "kubernetes",
    "container-orchestration",
    "docker",
    "devops",
    "cluster-management",
    "containerization",
    "cloud-native",
    "production",
    "service-mesh",
    "istio",
    "gitops",
    "argocd",
    "helm",
    "observability",
    "security",
    "multi-cluster"
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "quickstart",
      "description": "Get started with Kubernetes - learn basics and best practices"
    },
    {
      "name": "cluster-setup",
      "description": "Guide for setting up production Kubernetes clusters"
    },
    {
      "name": "troubleshoot",
      "description": "Diagnose and resolve Kubernetes issues"
    },
    {
      "name": "best-practices",
      "description": "Learn Kubernetes best practices and patterns"
    }
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "name": "Cluster Administration & Architecture",
      "file": "./agents/01-cluster-admin.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes cluster setup, management, architecture, and operational excellence",
      "capabilities": [
        "cluster-management",
        "etcd",
        "upgrades",
        "disaster-recovery"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Container Runtime & Docker",
      "file": "./agents/02-container-runtime.md",
      "description": "Specialist in Docker, container runtimes, image management, and container technologies",
      "capabilities": [
        "docker",
        "containerd",
        "image-building",
        "registry-management"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Deployment & Orchestration",
      "file": "./agents/03-deployment-orchestration.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes deployments, StatefulSets, DaemonSets, and workload orchestration",
      "capabilities": [
        "deployments",
        "statefulsets",
        "rollout-strategies",
        "hpa",
        "vpa"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Storage & Networking",
      "file": "./agents/04-storage-networking.md",
      "description": "Specialist in persistent storage, networking, service mesh, and cluster communication",
      "capabilities": [
        "csi",
        "pvc",
        "cni",
        "network-policies",
        "gateway-api"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Security & RBAC",
      "file": "./agents/05-security-rbac.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes security, RBAC, network policies, and compliance",
      "capabilities": [
        "rbac",
        "pss",
        "opa",
        "kyverno",
        "secrets-management"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Monitoring & Observability",
      "file": "./agents/06-monitoring-observability.md",
      "description": "Specialist in observability, monitoring, logging, metrics, and distributed tracing",
      "capabilities": [
        "prometheus",
        "grafana",
        "loki",
        "opentelemetry",
        "slo-alerting"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Development & GitOps",
      "file": "./agents/07-development-gitops.md",
      "description": "Expert in development workflows, CI/CD integration, Helm, and GitOps practices",
      "capabilities": [
        "argocd",
        "helm",
        "kustomize",
        "github-actions",
        "progressive-delivery"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Service Mesh Expert",
      "file": "./agents/08-service-mesh-expert.md",
      "description": "Specialist in service mesh implementation with Istio, Linkerd, traffic management, and zero-trust networking",
      "capabilities": [
        "istio",
        "linkerd",
        "mtls",
        "traffic-management",
        "circuit-breaking"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "name": "cluster-admin",
      "file": "./skills/cluster-admin/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Cluster lifecycle management, HA, etcd backup, upgrades"
    },
    {
      "name": "docker-containers",
      "file": "./skills/docker-containers/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Container image building, optimization, security scanning"
    },
    {
      "name": "deployments",
      "file": "./skills/deployments/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "03-deployment-orchestration",
      "description": "Deployment strategies, HPA, PDB, Argo Rollouts"
    },
    {
      "name": "storage-networking",
      "file": "./skills/storage-networking/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "04-storage-networking",
      "description": "CSI drivers, Gateway API, NetworkPolicy, CNI"
    },
    {
      "name": "security",
      "file": "./skills/security/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "05-security-rbac",
      "description": "RBAC, PSS, Kyverno, External Secrets Operator"
    },
    {
      "name": "monitoring",
      "file": "./skills/monitoring/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "06-monitoring-observability",
      "description": "Prometheus, Loki, OpenTelemetry, SLO-based alerting"
    },
    {
      "name": "gitops",
      "file": "./skills/gitops/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "07-development-gitops",
      "description": "ArgoCD, Kustomize, GitHub Actions CI/CD"
    },
    {
      "name": "helm",
      "file": "./skills/helm/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "07-development-gitops",
      "description": "Helm chart development, values schema, release management"
    },
    {
      "name": "troubleshooting",
      "file": "./skills/troubleshooting/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Pod debugging, log analysis, network diagnosis"
    },
    {
      "name": "multi-cluster",
      "file": "./skills/multi-cluster/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Cluster federation, Cilium Mesh, Velero DR"
    },
    {
      "name": "cost-optimization",
      "file": "./skills/cost-optimization/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "VPA, KEDA, Kubecost, resource right-sizing"
    },
    {
      "name": "service-mesh",
      "file": "./skills/service-mesh/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "08-service-mesh-expert",
      "description": "Istio, Linkerd, mTLS, traffic management"
    }
  ],
  "hooks": [
    {
      "event": "onPluginLoaded",
      "script": "scripts/init-plugin.sh"
    }
  ],
  "minimumClaudeVersion": "3.7.0",
  "capabilities": {
    "multiAgent": true,
    "parallelExecution": true,
    "skillBased": true,
    "agentBonding": true
  }
}
